GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.10.143
GSD.description:
i40e: Fix kernel crash during module removal

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.143 by commit 342d77769a6cceb3df7720a1e18baa4339eee3fc, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 0ef2d5afb12d379f4dd5df696219a01b88bb778a. For more details please see the references link.
